column1: The '''Undertowers''' was a dwelling of [[Hobbits]] in the [[Westmarch]] during the [[Fourth Age]]. It was located near the [[White Towers]].
It was at Undertowers that [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]]'s daughter [[Elanor Gardner]] settled with [[Fastred of Greenholm]] to found the [[Fairbairn Family]]
column2: the hereditary [[Warden of Westmarch|Wardens of Westmarch]].<ref>{{App|Later}}
column4: the Fairbairns would become as influential as the [[Took Family|Tooks]] and [[Brandybuck Family|Brandybuck]]s in the history of [[the Shire]]
column5: and it was at Undertowers that they preserved the [[Red Book of Westmarch]]
column6: whose contents formed the ultimate basis for chronicles of the [[War of the Ring]] and the [[Elder Days]].<ref>{{FR|Records}}</ref>

column2: towns and villages of the Shire]]
